title: New Delhi to counter China? US panel weighs India role to tilt Indo-Pacific power balance
summary_full: A US commission will hold a hearing next month on India's role in the Indo-Pacific. The session will assess India's relations with China and the US. It will cover geopolitical, military, economic, and technological aspects. The hearing aims to understand India's influence on regional power dynamics. This comes as major partners reassess US commitments.
